text.__SUMMARY__:
Lonchocarpus chiricanus is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in Panama.
text.Sources: Mitré, M. (1998). "Lonchocarpus chiricanus". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T30609A9565044. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T30609A9565044.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
